text: George Anthony Hudson (14 March 1937 - 28 December 2020) was an English professional footballer. He born in Manchester, England. He played as a centre forward in the Football League. His career lasted from 1958 to 1970. Hudson played for the Blackburn Rovers, Accrington Stanley, Peterborough United, Coventry City, Northampton Town, Tranmere Rovers and Altrincham. Hudson died on 28 December 2020 at the age of 83.NEWS:RIP George Hudson == Honours == * Coventry City Hall of Fame ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Footballers from Manchester Category:Blackburn Rovers F.C. players
title: George Hudson (footballer)
